name: Platinum Magnum
additionalNotes:
The Crossfire Platinum has a rich, Oscuro Ecuadorian Habana wrapper with a special blend of the Dominican filler and binder. The fragrance of sweet, dried fruit reminds you of the complexity and flavor of this cigar. It begins with a mild pepperiness and evolves to rich notes with a hint of dried fruit and a nice earthy resolve. This is a full bodied smoke with bold movement, yet holds its intricate character. As with all Crossfire cigars you will experience a natural draw and a great ash!
crossfirecigars.com
